structure.unit: State And Other Police, And Certain Powers And Duties Of The Department Of Public Safety

law.catch_line: Cities Authorized To Establish Force; Appointments To Force
law.text: Any city in which the city council, with the approval of the mayor, accepts this and the two following sections or has accepted corresponding provisions of earlier laws, may establish a reserve police force; and appointments thereto shall, subject to chapter thirty-one, be made in the same manner as appointments to the regular police force of said city.
